abstract: Maldives authorities arrest former president and current opposition leader Mohamed Nasheed; order him to stand trial on charges related to his 2012 decision to arrest senior judge.
lead_paragraph: The authorities on Sunday arrested Mr. Nasheed, the opposition leader and former president, ordering him to stand trial for his 2012 decision to arrest a senior judge.

headline.main: Ex-President Mohamed Nasheed Is Arrested in Maldives

snippet: The authorities on Sunday arrested Mr. Nasheed, the opposition leader and former president, ordering him to stand trial for his 2012 decision to arrest a senior judge.
